message.content:
cs.NE, cs.LG, cs.CV, cs.AI, cs.CL

The paper discusses the use of neural networks and deep learning methods, which are commonly associated with the cs.NE (Neural and Evolutionary Computing) sub-category. The paper also focuses on the ability of neural networks to learn continuously, which is related to the concept of lifelong learning in machine learning, making cs.LG (Machine Learning) another likely sub-category. The paper specifically applies the proposed method to image datasets, which suggests that cs.CV (Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition) is also a relevant sub-category. Additionally, the paper discusses the potential impact of the proposed method on adaptive machine learning algorithms, which could fall under cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) or cs.CL (Computation and Language).
